name: Hero-U: Wizard's Way Prototype
description:
This was a proof-of-concept by me (Cidney Hamilton), JP Selwood, and Al Eufrasio, to create a fully 3D and version of the Nido King Wing from Hero-U. This is not an official demo, just me and some artists learning Blender together. :)

Characters, location, and world are all properties of Corey and Lori Cole and Transolar Games. Created in Unity3D using Adventure Creator.
